view

Class StaffView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.StaffView

  • public class StaffView
extends java.lang.Object
    Displays the staff control panel and associated search windows. This window allows staff to search for a student and generate the corresponding SAIN Report. Administrators accessing this view have the added ability of editing a selected student.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • start

        public void start(boolean admin,
                  User user,
                  Major[] majors,
                  Course[] courses)
        Overloaded method which allows the courses object to be set before executing start()
        Parameters:
        courses - Array of currently declared courses
        admin - Whether or not logged in user is an Administrator
        user - Logged in user
        majors - Array of currently declared majors

      • start

        public void start(boolean admin,
                  User user,
                  Major[] majors)
        Displays the staff control panel and associated search windows. This window allows staff to search for a student and generate the corresponding SAIN Report. Administrators accessing this view have the added ability of editing a selected student.
        Parameters:
        admin - Whether or not logged in user is an Administrator
        user - Logged in user
        majors - Array of currently declared majors

      • adminEdit

        public void adminEdit(User user,
                      Student student,
                      Major[] majors)
        Allows the user to edit the previously selected student if the user is an Administrator/
        Parameters:
        user - Logged in user
        student - Student to be edited
        majors - Array of currently declared majors

      • parseId

        public java.lang.String parseId(int id)
        Appends 0's to the beginning of the ID if necessary to create an 8-digit ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID number to be parsed
        Returns:
        Parsed ID number. This may be equal to the original ID number, if that number was greater than 10000000
